jokes.Joke: When you enter a room, you have to kiss his ring. I don't mind, but he has it in his back pocket. (about Frank Sinatra) .
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: Show business is my life. When I was a kid I sold insurance, but nobody laughed.
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: De Niro, he’s sitting there. He’s one of the great actors of our time. You ask him.
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: You don’t have to call me ‘sir’ … King of All Jews is enough.
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: Is that your wife, sir? Jesus… what was it, a train?
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: I've got an accountant who's been with me forty years. If he makes a mistake, he dies.
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles

jokes.Joke: Who picks your clothes - Stevie Wonder?
jokes.Creator: Don Rickles
